intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: This is quite a passage. It's more like a catacomb than a tunnel.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Yeah, there's some spooky stuff down here for sure!

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Heh. Thank you for the warning. But I think we'll be all right.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Yes, thank you so much for accompanying us here, Elise. We'll be alright from here. I'd recommend that you stay with Cassita for a while...

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: What? Why?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Because...we're heading to the castle. That means that we'll be facing off against King Garon, and likely Xander too. Things could get ugly, and there's no need for you to be there.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: So what you're saying is...you're going to try to kill Xander and Father. Right?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I...I'm afraid I must do whatever it takes to end this war. Ultimately, I have to do what's right for the people of Hoshido and Nohr. If that means killing King Garon, or even Xander... Well...

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: I see... That settles it. I'm coming with you!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Huh?! No, Elise! It's too dangerous! And I can't let you fight your family! That's a burden I alone must bear.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Oh, don't be silly. I'm not gonna fight with anyone, and neither are you! I'm not siding with or against you, Brother/Sister. I want to help bring both sides together! I want the war to end just as much as you do. So! I'm coming with you to let Xander and Father and everyone else know how I feel. They're still super mad at YOU, but maybe they'll hear me out! Maybe we CAN end the war without any more fighting! Don't we at least have to try to end this without hurting each other more?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Elise... All right. I suppose you won't be in any danger from either side. Just promise me that you won't do anything reckless.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Yep, yep! I promise!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: All right, then. Let's get moving!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: So far, so good. This passage appears fairly well traveled. Although...I see a fork in the road ahead. Which way do we go, Elise?

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: The path on the right leads to an area near my quarters. Camilla said that the other path leads more or less to the throne room.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Right. Left path it is.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: But...she also said the left path is like a maze. She warned me to NEVER take that path, you guys!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Don't worry, Elise. You wouldn't believe what we've had to overcome to get here. I'm confident that we can get through anything together.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: If you say so...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: What's the matter?

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: It's just...you almost seem like a different person now. You're so...commanding. I guess I just have to get used to you being all grown up...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: It's true...I've done a lot of growing since I left Nohr. But don't worry, Elise. I'm still the same old Corrin. And I'll always do everything I can to protect you, Little Sister.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Aww, thank you. I'm so glad you came back! I love you so much!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Haha! Whoa! Easy with the monster hugs. I almost fell over!

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Heehee!
Ah! Did you hear that? That's Lady Elise's laugh!
Oh ho! You're right! Let's report this to Lady Camilla posthaste...

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: This part of the tunnel seems a bit ominous. Be on guard, everyone!

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: Yeah, are you seeing all of these traps? Most of 'em have been sprung, but I bet there are even more that haven't.

intro.speaker: Hinoka
intro.line: And the ones that did spring look like they were pretty effective. I'm seeing more corpses than I'd like...

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: C-corpses? Eek! I thought those were just decorations to make it spooky! I'm scared, Corrin.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: It's OK, Sakura. If you want to close your eyes, I can lead you through this part.

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: Oh...th-thank you so much...

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: What about me? I'm scared too!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Heh. I can help lead you, too. Just come over to this side.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Yay! Heehee! Uh-oh...do you hear that? There's someone behind us!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Elise...have you ever seen any Faceless down here?

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: Ah, Elise. There you are! I've been looking all over for you.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Camilla! What are you doing down here?

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: Like I said, I was looking for you. Are you hurt, darling? Who are all these people? Are you being kidnapped right now?!

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: What? No! These are—

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: The Hoshidans! I knew it. Well, I'm so glad we could meet down here. How DARE you bother my baby sister. I shall now make you all dearly regret ever stepping foot in here!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Hold on, Camilla. It's me, Corrin! We're not kidnapping Elise!

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: Corrin! How can this be? You're back in Nohr!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: It's...a long story.

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: Well, have you come to your senses? Are you returning to Nohr for good?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Oh...um... Sorry, but no. I want Hoshido and Nohr to be at peace, and that can't happen while Garon lives.

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: Hmm. I see. So you want to come back, but these awful people are still confusing your little head. Don't worry, darling. Big Sister is here to take care of these monsters for you!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Camilla, no! You don't understand!

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Please listen, Sister!

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: Don't worry, Elise. I promise to save our precious Corrin. Once I've killed all his/her friends, he's/she's sure to remember his/her true family. Right? Right!

battle.speaker: Arthur
battle.line: Never fear, Lady Elise! Arthur is here to vanquish your captors!

battle.speaker: Effie
battle.line: This won't be anything more than a light workout...

battle.speaker: Elise
battle.line: Oh, Arthur. I don't need saving! And, Effie...save your energy!

battle.speaker: Corrin
battle.line: Oh, Arthur and Effie... Those are your retainers, aren't they?

battle.speaker: Elise
battle.line: Yep! They're the best! They seem to think you're kidnapping me... Whoops! This is all my fault for sneaking out and running around with you. If you can get me over to them, I'm sure we can smooth this over.

battle.speaker: Corrin
battle.line: OK, I'll give it a shot. But remember...this is still a battlefield. Stay close!

battle-talk.speaker: Arthur
battle-talk.line: Lady Elise! I'm so glad you're safe. I was so disappointed in myself when I heard you were missing.

battle-talk.speaker: Elise
battle-talk.line: Oh, Arthur. I just came down to get away from the castle for a while. And just to be perfectly clear—Corrin is not kidnapping me!

battle-talk.speaker: Arthur
battle-talk.line: Oh. So there'll be no valiant rescue for me to perform today, I suppose...

battle-talk.speaker: Elise
battle-talk.line: Heehee! No, sorry about that, Arthur. I'm perfectly safe with Corrin. I'm trying to help him/her gain an audience with Father, that's all.

battle-talk.speaker: Arthur
battle-talk.line: Very well. I'll retreat the way I came. And I'll let Effie know as well. However, there's nothing I can do to stop Lady Camilla at this point. I hope you understand, milady.

battle-talk.speaker: Elise
battle-talk.line: *sigh* I know. My big sister can be so stubborn sometimes... Anyway, when this is all over, I'd like it if you came to my quarters for tea.

battle-talk.speaker: Arthur
battle-talk.line: Erm...you mean it's not over...now?

battle-talk.speaker: Elise
battle-talk.line: There's one last thing I gotta help Corrin with! It's all up to me! Don't worry about me. I'll be perfectly safe with Corrin. And afterward we can celebrate a new era of peace with some tea! Heehee!

battle-talk.speaker: Arthur
battle-talk.line: Nothing would please me more, milady. I shall await your triumphant return!

battle-talk.speaker: Elise
battle-talk.line: Yup! Thanks, Arthur. I'm lucky to have you as my retainer!

battle-talk.speaker: Arthur
battle-talk.line: You kind words are much appreciated.

battle-talk.speaker: Effie
battle-talk.line: Corrin, step away from Lady Elise at once!

battle-talk.speaker: Elise
battle-talk.line: No, Effie...it's OK! Corrin isn't kidnapping me. I snuck out of the castle on my own.

battle-talk.speaker: Effie
battle-talk.line: I don't understand... We've all been worried sick!

battle-talk.speaker: Elise
battle-talk.line: I'm trying to help Corrin settle things with Father before someone gets hurt. I can't stand watching people I love trying to kill each other. That includes you!

battle-talk.speaker: Effie
battle-talk.line: Well...my allegiance is to you above all others, Lady Elise. So as long as it appears you are in no danger, I will retreat. However, I'm not sure I can persuade Lady Camilla to stand down. I'm sorry. I hope you understand.

battle-talk.speaker: Elise
battle-talk.line: It's OK. I understand. When all of this is over, please meet me back at my quarters.

battle-talk.speaker: Effie
battle-talk.line: When all of this is over? What do you mean?

battle-talk.speaker: Elise
battle-talk.line: There's still something I need to help Corrin with! I won't be long. Don't worry about me, Effie. Like I said, when this all blows over, we'll have tea in my quarters. I can't wait!

battle-talk.speaker: Effie
battle-talk.line: Very well, milady. I'll let Arthur know you're OK. Please stay safe.

battle-talk.speaker: Elise
battle-talk.line: Yup! Thanks, Effie. Love you!

battle-talk.speaker: Effie
battle-talk.line: I love you, too...

boss.speaker: Arthur
boss.line: In the name of justice, I won't let you scoundrels kidnap Lady Elise!

boss.speaker: Arthur
boss.line: I've failed you, Lady Elise... Please...forgive me.

boss.speaker: Effie
boss.line: I've been training my entire life for this moment. Do you really think you stand a chance?

boss.speaker: Effie
boss.line: I couldn't protect you... I'm so sorry, Elise...

boss.speaker: Selena
boss.line: I let you win last time. You know that, right? Well, the kid gloves are coming off this time! You're going down!

boss.speaker: Selena
boss.line: Not fair!

boss.speaker: Beruka
boss.line: I'll defeat you all. Then Corrin will return, and Lady Camilla will smile again...

boss.speaker: Beruka
boss.line: How frustrating...

boss.speaker: Camilla
boss.line: Hmm... Once all of you are out of my way, Corrin will be all mine!

boss.speaker: Camilla
boss.line: I still love you, Corrin...

boss.speaker: Selena
boss.line: Ugh. You again.

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Why do you seem so unhappy to see me?

boss.speaker: Selena
boss.line: We're about to fight, dummy! Lady Camilla told me not to kill you, though, so I guess it's your lucky day.

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Heh, so you're going to go easy on me, then?

boss.speaker: Selena
boss.line: Argh! Yes, but ONLY because Lady Camilla said so! Geez! Anyway, I'm not allowed to kill you, but that doesn't mean I can't beat you up!

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: *sigh*

boss.speaker: Beruka
boss.line: What are you doing? I'm not supposed to kill you. Just get out of my way, and I'll let you live.

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Sorry, I can't do that. You'll have to get through me to get to my friends.

boss.speaker: Beruka
boss.line: But I...I'm not allowed to kill you. This doesn't make sense.

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: You're exactly right! There's no need for us to fight.

boss.speaker: Beruka
boss.line: Hmm. I can't disobey an order. I suppose I'll just have to render you unconscious and then kill your friends.

boss.speaker: Camilla
boss.line: Oh, I'm so happy you're coming back to us, Corrin!

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Camilla...I'm not coming back. I'm trying to end this war! I don't want to fight you, but I can't let you stand in my way.

boss.speaker: Camilla
boss.line: Awww, I can't stand to see you upset like this. Come over here, and I'll just put you to sleep for a little while. I won't hurt you! I just need you to stay calm while I kill these fiends...

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: You leave me no choice...

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: So...it wasn't meant to be...you coming back to us... And now it looks like I'm losing my precious Elise, too...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Camilla. You're not losing anyone. Elise is just coming with us to help persuade King Garon and Xander.

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: Persuade them? Is it...possible?

end.speaker: Elise
end.line: Well, we won't know until we try. We have to change their minds to stop the fighting! I'm just doing whatever I can to bring our family back together again. It turns out we all want the same thing, Camilla! To be together again!

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: Oh, Elise...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Listen. When the war is over, I want to establish a peaceful alliance. If Nohr and Hoshido are on cordial terms, we don't have to be estranged. I must believe that if I end the war, I'll be able to return to my family one day.

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: Do you really think peace is possible? I'd love to be a family again...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: What is the point of believing otherwise? We will either forge a peaceful future or die trying.

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: I see. Well, I suppose it would be wonderful if we could all get along... I think I understand what you're trying to do. I hope you can make it happen.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Thank you, Camilla.

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: Yes...I can imagine it now. Xander, Leo, Elise, and...the Hoshidan Prince/Princess Corrin. We could all have a picnic! And there would be games, and food, and... Oh, dear...I'm feeling a bit woozy...

end.speaker: Elise
end.line: Camilla, are you OK?

end.speaker: Selena
end.line: Her pulse is strong, and she's breathing normally. I think she's fine. But she took quite a beating in that fight, and she must have been exhausted... No matter. We can take care of her. The rest of you are free to go.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Oh? You won't try to stop us?

end.speaker: Selena
end.line: Yeah! You heard what she said, right? We can't go against Lady Camilla's orders just because she's unconscious! As much as I'd like to keep fighting...

end.speaker: Beruka
end.line: Selena...anger is clouding your judgment.

end.speaker: Selena
end.line: Whatever, Beruka! I'm tired—why don't you pick up Camilla and carry her back to her quarters.

end.speaker: Beruka
end.line: Why me?

end.speaker: Selena
end.line: Did you not hear me? I'm tired! That's why you!

end.speaker: Beruka
end.line: I see.

end.speaker: Selena
end.line: All right, Corrin. Get out of here before we change our minds! You just gave Lady Camilla hope... Don't go breaking her heart again!

end.speaker: Beruka
end.line: Go ahead, Corrin. Hurry.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Right. Thank you. And thank you, Camilla, for finally understanding my aim. This war is coming to an end...I promise!
